data.message: Eminem has 15 grammys plus an oscar...every album he releases has an award...he's turning 43 in a few days...he's white yes but is he the greatest rapper on the face of the earth....? I believe he is...people don't buy your music coz you white or black people waste their money on em coz he's music is worth it...another thing Pac was a great rapper but he died along time ago and he's not here...Eminem is THE RAP KING RAP LEGENG RAP MASTER RAP GENIUS HE IS A RAP GOD....FINISH...If anyone denies that than its pure jealousy
